name: Unexpected Shift
description:
Unexpected Shift is a simple, short and sweet puzzle platformer game which will mess with your mind.

  The game itself has a really simple concept. You start in a room where you need to find and reach your destination point (dice).

  First level seems pretty easy but everything changes when you encounter a dice that is too high to reach. Using special abilities you are able to do unexpected changes to the level (just like rolling a dice): change gravity, flip levels, move platforms, stop the time and much more!

Constrols:

Move - A/D
Jump - Space/W
Interact - E
Roll the Dice - R

The game you are about to download was made in 48 hours during the biggest game making marathon - GMTK gamejam 2022. 


Sorry for any bugs in advance!

Credits:

  • Game by - PolyCube
  • Music by - J0shexe  & Mr_MusicGuy
  • Playtesting  - CatGumba
